name: I, PIRATE
description:
- Currently in Development -

Set the Sea Ablaze!

Pilot a mighty pirate ship and sink your foes upon the high seas!

Become a Force of Nature!

Upgrade your boat to become more powerful, using coin you've plundered from dangerous foes!

Be More Pirate!

Download FREE!

Roadmap
  1. Co-op Pirate Battle (In Development)
  2. Team Boss Battles
  3. Water Cosmetic Touch-ups
  4. Ship Classes (Cutter, Galleon, Man'O'War)

Current Version - Proof of Concept

Version 0.13 - First implementation of Lives System

Player 1 - WASD Movement, GH for corresponding cannons

Player 2 - Arrows Movement, <> for corresponding cannons
